name: Flu immunization
title: ANC.DT.31 Flu immunization
description: If the woman has not yet been immunized with the seasonal flu vaccine, she should be immunized

action.title: Provide seasonal flu immunization
action.textEquivalent: Pregnant women should be vaccinated with trivalent inactivated influenza vaccine at any stage of pregnancy

documentation.label: Vaccines against influenza WHO position paper (2012) (10)
